value.title: StarCraft 2: SERRAL vs HEROMARINE!

value.title: StarCraft 2: The World Championship GRAND FINALS! (Best-of-7)

The winner of this match is the current World Champion of StarCraft 2.  IEM Katowice 2022 on Liquipedia: https://liquipedia.net/starcraft2/IEM_Katowice/2022
